name: Ava and Avior Save the Earth
name_original: Ava and Avior Save the Earth
description: Go green and save the Earth. Ava and "Avior" from Planet "Avior" are on a mission to Earth to educate everyone on how to save the earth by recycling. The Journey starts in the Country side & moves all the way to Suburbia & Mountain ranges and ends at a surprise location. Very educational with tons of fun!
